name: Roo.menu.CheckItem
desc: Adds a menu item that contains a checkbox by default, but can also be part of a radio group.

config.name: listeners
showDelay
config.desc: Length of time in milliseconds to wait before showing this item (defaults to 200)

config.name: text
config.desc: The text to show on the menu item.

config.name: activeClass
config.desc: The CSS class to use when the item becomes activated (defaults to "x-menu-item-active")

config.name: hidden
config.desc: True to prevent creation of this menu item (defaults to false)

config.name: group
config.desc:
All check items with the same group name will automatically be grouped into a single-select
radio button group (defaults to '')

config.name: handler
config.desc: A function that will handle the click event of this menu item (defaults to undefined)

config.name: hideDelay
config.desc: Length of time in milliseconds to wait before hiding after a click (defaults to 100)

config.name: hideOnClick
config.desc: True to hide the containing menu after this item is clicked (defaults to true)

config.name: allowDomMove
config.desc: Whether the component can move the Dom node when rendering (defaults to true).

config.name: itemCls
config.desc: The default CSS class to use for check items (defaults to "x-menu-item x-menu-check-item")

config.name: HTML
config.desc:
to render in menu
The text to show on the menu item (HTML version).

config.name: actionMode
config.desc:
which property holds the element that used for  hide() / show() / disable() / enable()
default is 'el'

config.name: groupClass
config.desc: The default CSS class to use for radio group check items (defaults to "x-menu-group-item")

config.name: canActivate
config.desc: True if this item can be visually activated (defaults to true)

config.name: icon
config.desc: The path to an icon to display in this menu item (defaults to Roo.BLANK_IMAGE_URL)

config.name: checked
config.desc:
True to initialize this checkbox as checked (defaults to false).  Note that
if this checkbox is part of a radio group (group = true) only the last item in the group that is
initialized with checked = true will be rendered as checked.

config.name: disableClass
config.desc: CSS class added to the component when it is disabled (defaults to "x-item-disabled").

methods.name: setChecked
methods.desc: Set the checked state of this item

params.name: checked
params.desc: The new checked value

params.name: suppressEvent
params.desc: (optional) True to prevent the checkchange event from firing (defaults to false)

methods.name: setText
methods.desc: Sets the text to display in this menu item

params.name: text
params.desc: The text to display

params.name: isHTML
params.desc: true to indicate text is pure html.

methods.name: getId
methods.desc: Returns the id of this component.

methods.name: render
methods.desc: If this is a lazy rendering component, render it to its container element.

params.name: container
params.desc: (optional) The element this component should be rendered into. If it is being applied to existing markup, this should be left off.

methods.name: destroy
methods.desc:
Destroys this component by purging any event listeners, removing the component's element from the DOM,
removing the component from its {@link Roo.Container} (if applicable) and unregistering it from {@link Roo.ComponentMgr}.

methods.name: isVisible
methods.desc: Returns true if this component is visible.

methods.name: setDisabled
methods.desc: Convenience function for setting disabled/enabled by boolean.

methods.name: hide
methods.desc: Hide this component.

methods.name: focus
methods.desc: Try to focus this component.

params.name: selectText
params.desc: True to also select the text in this component (if applicable)

methods.name: show
methods.desc: Show this component.

methods.name: enable
methods.desc: Enable this component.

methods.name: setVisible
methods.desc: Convenience function to hide or show this component by boolean.

params.name: visible
params.desc: True to show, false to hide

methods.name: disable
methods.desc: Disable this component.

methods.name: getEl
methods.desc: Returns the underlying {@link Roo.Element}.

methods.name: purgeListeners
methods.desc: Removes all listeners for this object

methods.name: on
methods.desc: Appends an event handler to this element (shorthand for addListener)

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The method the event invokes

params.name: scope
params.desc:
(optional) The scope in which to execute the handler
function. The handler function's "this" context.

params.name: options
params.desc: (optional)

methods.name: un
methods.desc: Removes a listener (shorthand for removeListener)

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The handler to remove

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the handler

methods.name: addEvents
methods.desc: Used to define events on this Observable

params.name: object
params.desc: The object with the events defined

methods.name: releaseCapture
methods.desc: Removes all added captures from the Observable.

params.name: o
params.desc: The Observable to release

methods.name: removeListener
methods.desc: Removes a listener

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The handler to remove

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the handler

methods.name: fireEvent
methods.desc: Fires the specified event with the passed parameters (minus the event name).

params.name: args
params.desc: Variable number of parameters are passed to handlers

methods.name: hasListener
methods.desc: Checks to see if this object has any listeners for a specified event

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The name of the event to check for

methods.name: capture
methods.desc: Starts capture on the specified Observable. All events will be passed to the supplied function with the event name + standard signature of the event before the event is fired. If the supplied function returns false, the event will not fire.

params.name: o
params.desc: The Observable to capture

params.name: fn
params.desc: The function to call

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the fn

methods.name: addListener
methods.desc: Appends an event handler to this component

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The method the event invokes

params.name: scope
params.desc:
(optional) The scope in which to execute the handler
function. The handler function's "this" context.

params.name: options

events.name: *beforecheckchange
events.desc: Fires before the checked value is set, providing an opportunity to cancel if needed

params.name: checked
params.desc: The new checked value that will be set

events.name: *checkchange
events.desc: Fires after the checked value has been set

params.name: checked
params.desc: The checked value that was set

events.name: *click
events.desc: Fires when this item is clicked

events.name: *activate
events.desc: Fires when this item is activated

events.name: *deactivate
events.desc: Fires when this item is deactivated

events.name: *beforerender
events.desc: Fires before the component is rendered. Return false to stop the render.

events.name: *disable
events.desc: Fires after the component is disabled.

events.name: *render
events.desc: Fires after the component is rendered.

events.name: *destroy
events.desc: Fires after the component is destroyed.

events.name: *hide
events.desc: Fires after the component is hidden.

events.name: *beforehide
events.desc: Fires before the component is hidden. Return false to stop the hide.

events.name: *show
events.desc: Fires after the component is shown.

events.name: *beforeshow
events.desc: Fires before the component is shown.  Return false to stop the show.

events.name: *enable
events.desc: Fires after the component is enabled.

events.name: *beforedestroy
events.desc: Fires before the component is destroyed. Return false to stop the destroy.
